name: Spooky Solayu Stories (preview)
loreDescription: A book written by a ghost story aficionado. The first story features a sad little ghost girl who appears within a hazy beam of light.

skillDescription.base: Increases Hit Chance and Effectiveness of all allies by 2.5%. Does not stack with an Artifact providing the same effect.
skillDescription.max: Increases Hit Chance and Effectiveness of all allies by 5%. Does not stack with an Artifact providing the same effect.
